alert.note: Alert for Traverse (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 30 at 2:58PM CDT until May 30 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM CDT FOR TRAVERSE...NORTHWESTERN BIG STONE AND EASTERN ROBERTS COUNTIES... At 258 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Barry, or 15 miles southwest of Wheaton, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Rainbow Island, Lake Traverse, Halls Landing, Silver Bridge, Wheaton and Mud Lake Landing. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for west central Minnesota...and northeastern South Dakota. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
